articles.title: Iran’s IRGC seizes ‘Israeli-linked’ ship near Strait of Hormuz - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: IRGC forces conducted an operation via helicopter to take control of the commercial vessel, state media reports.
articles.content:
Tehran, Iran Iranian armed forces have seized a container ship near the Strait of Hormuz amid rising tensions across the region after a deadly Israeli attack on Irans consulate in Syria.
